comments.body:
It looks like the license file is not included in the source distribution. I've submitted a PR to fix this (https://github.com/Ibotta/sk-dist/pull/47). Until that gets merged or another solution is implemented upstream, you will need to manually package the license file. See:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually

Also please add the following comment as a visual reminder to check the status of the license file in the source distribution in future updates to the feedstock:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/Ibotta/sk-dist/pull/47
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

When the license file is included in the source distribution, you can delete this comment and remove the manually packaged copy.
PR you submitted was already merged. No changes should be needed then.
The license file won't be in the source distribution until a new release is pushed to pypi. Until then, leave the comment in as a reminder and manually package the license file.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@  license: Apache-2.0
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/Ibotta/sk-dist/pull/47
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
